plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: Copay accums towards Deduct = {0}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Define whether Copay Looks at OPX
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: Copay looks at OPX = {0}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Member Responsibility based on Network Type
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Network Type = {0}, any costs above the allowable amount is member's responsibility

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Member Responsibility based on Network Type and Provider Name
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Network Type = {0} and Provider Name = {1}, any costs above the allowable amount is member's responsibility

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Benefit Year Definition
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: The benefit year will be defined as a {0}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Maximum Period for Benefit Extension
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: Benefits for disabled members will be provided for no more than {0} months from the termination period

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Maximum period for Benefit Extension based on Service Type
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Service Type = {0}, benefits for disabled members will be provided for {1} days or until the member is discharged whichever occurs first from the termination period

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Termination of Benefits Extension for Plan Not Subject to COBRA
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If an Employee terminates under a plan not subject to COBRA, that Employee and their Dependents remain covered for a period of {0} days after such termination, unless during such period the Employee and their Dependents become entitled to similar insurance from some other source

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Data Limitations
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: Claim must be filed within {0} {1} following the service date

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Copay When Service Level Copay Doesn't Exist
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If service level copay is not defined, apply contract level copay for that service

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Copay Based on Allowed Amount
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Allowed Amount < ${0} then Copay = ${1}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Coins and Deductible Restrictions based on Place of Treatment
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: IF Place of Treatment is Retail Clinic THEN coins is {0} AND Subject to Deductible ={1}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Coins When Service Level Coins Doesn't Exist
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If service level coins is not defined, apply contract level coins for that service

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Define cost sharing for Out of Packet Maximum
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Out of Pocket Maximum is met, Eligible Cost Sharing = {0}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set PCP Provider Definition Based on Provider Specialty
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: IF Provider Specialty is {0}THEN Provider is PCP

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set PCP Change Restrictions
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: The member will be allowed to change their PCP on a {0} basis

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Carry Over Credit Restrictions Based on Quarter Number
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Quarter Number = {0} then Carry Over Credit = {1}

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set No Member Responsibility based on Network Type when Claim is Denied
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Network Type = {0} and claim is denied then Member Responsibility = {1}% of Claim Balance

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Allowed Amount Restrictions
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: For Medicare recipients, Allowed Amount <= Medicare Limiting charge

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Coordination of Benefits for Medicare Based on Age
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Age > {0} and Primary Insurer = Medicare then one cannot be covered under an Exchange plan

plan_rules.Rule_Name: Set Lifetime Maximum based on Regulation
plan_rules.Rule_Desscription: If Regulation = {0} then Lifetime Maximum = {1}
